title: Dubai Luxury Escape
description: Experience Dubai in style with desert safaris, luxury shopping, and stunning skyline views. Includes accommodation in a 5-star hotel, city tours, and a dinner cruise along Dubai Marina.

title: Paris & The French Riviera Tour
description: Fall in love with the romance of Paris before heading south to the sun-drenched beaches of the Riviera. Includes Eiffel Tower entry, Louvre tour, and luxury seaside accommodation.

title: Safari Adventure in Kenya
description: Get up close with Africa’s Big Five in the Maasai Mara National Reserve. Stay in beautiful lodges and enjoy guided safaris, local cuisine, and cultural experiences with the Maasai people.

title: Maldives Island Retreat
description: Relax in an overwater villa surrounded by turquoise lagoons. Package includes breakfast, spa session, snorkeling trip, and private sunset dinner by the beach.

title: Greek Islands Explorer
description: Sail through the Aegean Sea, discover ancient ruins, and enjoy breathtaking sunsets over Santorini. Includes ferry transfers, guided tours, and Greek cuisine experiences.

title: Bali Adventure & Culture Tour
description: Immerse yourself in Balinese culture with temple visits, rice terrace walks, and beach relaxation. Includes spa treatments and a private cooking class with local chefs.

title: Cape Town & Garden Route Discovery
description: Explore South Africa’s most scenic coastal drive, from Table Mountain to Knysna. Includes wine tasting, whale watching, and guided nature tours along the Garden Route.

title: Thailand Temples & Beaches
description: Discover the best of Thailand — golden temples, vibrant street markets, and white sandy beaches. Includes local flights, guided tours, and traditional Thai cooking experience.
